post.body: That'd be about $300/wk, four kids. Plus dog. And hungry preggo mom. Am anticipating sounds of horror coming shortly.
Does, er, that friend need another friend? I could always use that kind of friend.
And when strangers offer a compliment? Like, about your kids? ZERO vested interest. Love that.
Almost forgot the kiddie bday party at 4pm. Not a drop-off, outta the sweatpants. And kid given cake at 5:30 w/o dinner? Hate those.
Dinner ideas using what's on hand.... Ground turkey and, um, corn flakes? coconut milk and, say, mac & cheese? Back to drawing board.
Two gems from ESL mom from son's class: 1) "You no have husband's name?" Uh, no. 2) "You having another baby?" Thanks for outing me at 8w.
Husband's flight Bos-Raleigh turned around on runway & went back to gate because pilot BOOTED on copilot's leg. Canceled, plane unusable;-)
My pickyeater 7yo invited to lunch playdate, authentic Chinese family. Is also unfailingly polite. Oh to be a fly on wall...to live-tweet it
Public Service Announcement for first-trimester preggos: There is such a thing as too much pickle.
Casualty of garland & wire cutters, 4 stitches. Needed friend to sit w/sleeping kids. Will get mileage from husb not leaving party. Heh heh.
Littlest 2 down for naps and I'm bannister-winding...and winding and winding. Any justice in the world & someone would be tucking me in too.
Dreamed of broken strollers, crumbling houses, escaped pets. Control, anyone? My dreams are so naked and predictable I'm a sleeping cliche.
Messiah is one of those things that doesn't need to be pepped up w/ plucky arrangements. Or maybe I'm just a stodgy Bostonian. Want gravitas
Agog: Just heard a legal commentator express sympathy 4 OJ, who was apologetic in courtroom. "I mean, it's not as if he's a sociopath." Huh?
News for ya hon, King of Recycling: They're gonna find out you leave the closet light on.
Husb scheduled an energy audit, certain to result in alien-light bulbs at my writing desk. Must have been dranking free-range coffee again.
Next procratination from work: Xmas lists. Dear Santa, don't let my husb believe me when I say I want nothing but our living room renovatn.
Sitter returns after much sick leave! In my giddiness for free time, do I... write? exercise? No, this: http://tinyurl.com/35xxbt .
It is NOT better to have napped briefly than never to have napped at all.
Trying to pass new school construx in town: Mindboggling lack of savvy in community campaign orgnzn. Tho stingy on ed is nat'l trend, yes?
The 3yo thinks my husb and I are 1 person. "Momdad." Can't remember what age it goes 3D, parents as more than cardboard cutouts, individuals
Vegas airport, 1.5 hr layover. Any musts?
Real live sitter, rgoing to Benjamin Button. Anyone seen? Read good things plus there's the Pitt/Redford factor, yum at any age.
Fielding questions about the Big Bang vs. God on the night of my oldest's 8th bday. Wondering what the 9th will bring.
Doing the momathon of Xmas immed followed by eldest's bday & the struggle to make it special... love the child, hate the conception date.
Mass en masse. Fifty bucks says one of my four kids ends up knocking over the nativity.
